short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome app for formatting JSON.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using this app, one can format JSON by simply pasting it in, and clicking format. This acts as both a JSON formatter, and validator.

* Please note, updated versions are published to GitHub sooner than they are published to the Chrome Web Store. Find the latest release at https://github.com/jackdalton/json-formatter/releases/latest

This project is open-source: https://github.com/jackdalton/json-formatter
